meta.label: Sentiment Analysis
meta.description: Estimate the sentiment polarity of text data. ⚠️ Dataiku strongly recommends to rather use the native [Generative AI](https://doc.dataiku.com/dss/latest/generative-ai/index.html) features, which mostly supersede this plugin.
meta.author: Dataiku (Alex COMBESSIE, Hicham EL BOUKKOURI)
